items.sentence: Tom is convinced that he's doing the right thing.
Tom is the one who'll drive Mary to the hospital.
Tom made jam from the strawberries Mary gave him.
Tom is afraid he might do something he'll regret.
Tom is the one that suggested we try it this way.
Tom got killed in a traffic accident last winter.
Tom asked Mary if he could close all the windows.
I'm going to arrive in Boston tomorrow afternoon.
Both Tom and Mary are very friendly, aren't they?
Tom plugged his headphones into his music player.
Tom was lying flat on his back on a hospital bed.
I'd be surprised if Tom could do that by himself.
Blue whales are the largest animals in the world.
Tom was very angry even though he didn't show it.
Tom admitted everything when Mary confronted him.
This is the tallest building that I've ever seen.
If you don't like that, you don't have to eat it.
I rung the bell countless times, but nobody came.
I like visiting places I've never been to before.
If you come in second, you'll get a silver medal.
